00004 /*! \file octeon_ioctl.h
00005     \brief Host Driver: Ioctl values available to host user applications.
00006 */
00007 
00008 #ifndef  __OCTEON_IOCTL_H__
00009 #define  __OCTEON_IOCTL_H__
00010 
00011 
00012 #if defined(_WIN32)
00013 
00014 #define _IOWR(_A, _B, _C) CTL_CODE(FILE_DEVICE_UNKNOWN, 0x8000 | _B, METHOD_NEITHER, \
00015                    FILE_READ_DATA | FILE_WRITE_DATA)
00016 #endif
00017 
00018 #define OCTEON_MAGIC   0xC1
00019 
00020 /* NOTE: It is recommended that you don't call the ioctl directly but use the
00021          octeon driver API's defined in
00022          $OCTEON_ROOT/components/driver/api/octeon_user.h.
00023          The API's perform sanity checks on the values passed to the driver.
00024 */
00025 
00026 #define OCTEON_SEND_REQUEST_CODE               1
00027 #define OCTEON_QUERY_REQUEST_CODE              2
00028 #define OCTEON_READ_PCI_CONFIG_CODE            4
00029 #define OCTEON_WRITE_PCI_CONFIG_CODE           5
00030 #define OCTEON_READ32_CODE                     6
00031 #define OCTEON_WRITE32_CODE                    7
00032 #define OCTEON_READ16_CODE                     8
00033 #define OCTEON_WRITE16_CODE                    9
00034 #define OCTEON_READ8_CODE                      10
00035 #define OCTEON_WRITE8_CODE                     11
00036 #define OCTEON_GET_DEV_COUNT_CODE              12
00037 #define OCTEON_GET_MAPPING_INFO_CODE           13
00038 #define OCTEON_WIN_READ_CODE                   14
00039 #define OCTEON_WIN_WRITE_CODE                  15
00040 #define OCTEON_STATS_CODE                      16
00041 
00042 #define OCTEON_CORE_MEM_READ_CODE              30
00043 #define OCTEON_CORE_MEM_WRITE_CODE             31
00044 
00045 #define OCTEON_HOT_RESET_CODE                  40
00046

00048         _IOWR(OCTEON_MAGIC, OCTEON_SEND_REQUEST_CODE, octeon_soft_request_t)
00049

00051         _IOWR(OCTEON_MAGIC, OCTEON_QUERY_REQUEST_CODE, octeon_query_request_t)
00052
